channel.title: Hd 508 client error
channel.description: hey guys i've been having some errors when i launch my 508 HD Client. Basicly, it freezes at Starting 3d library and a message pops up in my client cmd saying: error_game_caps_vesa. :confused: If possible can somebody please help me? Thanks :) NOTE: I have followed many tutorials but they all lead to this problem.
